name: ExplainXKCD
0:
”Alexa, explain xkcd”
”Alexa, ask explain xkcd to explain number 2058”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: explain x. k. c. d.
des: Is today's XKCD comic strip not making much sense? Have Alexa explain! Simply ask her to "explain XKCD" and she'll read from the explainxkcd.com wiki explanation. You can also ask her to explain past comics by reference number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
